alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Nemaha (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 8:29PM CDT until July 04 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Nemaha County in northeastern Kansas... Northeastern Marshall County in northeastern Kansas... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 829 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Auburn to 9 miles north of Summerfield to Diller, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Mesonet. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marysville, Sabetha, Seneca, Axtell, Beattie, Bern, Summerfield, Oneida, Oketo, Baileyville and Woodlawn. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
